name: Sheet Pan Greek Chicken and Potatoes
preparation: In a large mixing bowl, whisk first 4 ingredients.
Add potato wedges, chicken, and 1⁄2 cup broth. Mix to coat.

Place on Sheet Pan lined with a Sheet Pan Liner. Bake 35 minutes or until potatoes are golden and juice runs clear from chicken. Drizzle with remaining broth halfway through cooking. Serve immediately.
tips: Use our Epicure Broth Mixes which have energizing nutritional yeast which is fortified with vitamins and minerals including B12.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup steamed vegetables, your choice

products.name: Greek Dressing Mix
summary: Herbs make salad dressings taste great, but they can be a pain to buy and use while fresh. Enter our Greek Dressing to solve the problem. Packed with only good food ingredients, including garlic, oregano, mint, and zero additives, it’s easy to make your own healthy dressing with this simple blend. Just mix it with olive oil and red wine vinegar and give it a shake. Add crumbled feta or Greek yogurt for a creamier dressing.
